Class BoatPath

java.lang.Object
swan.g09.cs230a2.Tile
swan.g09.cs230a2.BoatPath
public final class BoatPath extends Tile
A boat that moves back and forth, and the player can walk on and off it.

    • BoatPath

      public BoatPath(javafx.geometry.Point2D newPosition, Direction pathPushDirection, Boolean isBoatHere)
      Constructor for a BoatPath.
      Parameters:
      newPosition - The coordinate this BoatPath is located at
      pathPushDirection - The direction the boat should take from this path
      isBoatHere - Whether this tile should currently have a boat on it

  • Method Details

    • walkedOn

      public void walkedOn(swan.g09.cs230a2.Actor a)
      Handles the water being walked on. Becomes a path if block, ends game if player.
      Parameters:
      a - The actor walking over the tile.

    • moveBoatTo

      public void moveBoatTo(Boolean isReversing)
      Method to move a boat onto this tile. This is where the sprite is updated Should be called before moveBoatAway in tick so any rider doesn't drown
      Parameters:
      isReversing - whether the boat is currently reversing (for non-loop paths)
